Resident Evil 3: Dark Infection

Achievements.Title: Infection I
Achievements.Description: Kill all 10 zombies in Uptown - Residential Street. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Finally! A gun
Achievements.Description: Take the Hand Gun. (Heavy Mode, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Oil Lighter
Achievements.Description: Unlock the door in Uptown - Barricaded Back Passage. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Nemesis I
Achievements.Description: Defeat Nemesis in Police Station 1F - Courtyard. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Inmate 4204
Achievements.Description: Kill the prisoner zombie in Police Station 1F - Evidence Room. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Let's blow up some zombies' head
Achievements.Description: Take the NC-94. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Infection II
Achievements.Description: Kill all 5 cerberus in Uptown - Parking Area and Garage. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Did any mercenary drop it?
Achievements.Description: Take the Merc's Handgun.(Heavy Mode, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Nemesis II
Achievements.Description: Defeat Nemesis in Downtown - Press Office. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: This will be useful to the cable car
Achievements.Description: Find the hidden door in Downtown - Press Office and get the power cable. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Infection III
Achievements.Description: Kill both drain deimos in Uptown - Zigzag Alley. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Infection IV
Achievements.Description: Kill all 8 zombies in Downtown - City Hall Gate. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Infection V
Achievements.Description: Choose [Hide on the back] option in Downtown - Sub Station and kill all 10 zombies that invaded the area. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Elemental Burst
Achievements.Description: Take the Grenade Launcher. (Heavy Mode, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: No time to change clothes
Achievements.Description: Take the boutique key in Uptown - Straight Alleyway. (Heavy Mode, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Watch your step, monster
Achievements.Description: Take the Mine Thrower. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Infection VI
Achievements.Description: Kill all 8 crows in Uptown - Parking Area. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: How did this rifle get here?
Achievements.Description: Choose [Jump off] option in Downtown - Garage and take the Assault Rifle. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Thriller Night
Achievements.Description: Kill all 5 zombies in Park - Graveyard. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Giant Worm
Achievements.Description: Kill Grave Digger in Park - Graveyard. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Infection VII
Achievements.Description: Kill all 8 zombies in Dead Factory 2F - Entry Corridor. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Infection VIII
Achievements.Description: Kill both hunters in Hospital B3 - Experiment Room. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Nemesis III
Achievements.Description: Defeat Nemesis in Dead Factory 2F - Treatment Room. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Hey, this item is not used here
Achievements.Description: Use the Chrono Gear on the locked door in Dead Factory 2F - Entry Corridor. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Nemesis IV
Achievements.Description: After using Chrono Gear in Dead Factory 2F - Entry Corridor don't discard it, go back to Clock Tower 3F and reuse the item, then equip the knife and defeat Nemesis. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: The map is my GPS
Achievements.Description: Carlos: Reach the other door in Clock Tower 1F - Main Hall. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: UBCS Special Weapon
Achievements.Description: Carlos: Take the Mine Thrower in Clock Tower 1F - Main Hall. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: This Magnum is very different...
Achievements.Description: Take the Rifle. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Let's Rocket
Achievements.Description: Take the Rocket Launcher. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Nemesis V
Achievements.Description: Carlos: Defeat the last Nemesis form before connecting all batteries. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Calm down, lady. I'm not a zombie
Achievements.Description: Finish the game as Carlos Oliveira. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: It's finally over!
Achievements.Description: Finish the game as Jill Valentine. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Pro Survivor
Achievements.Description: Finish the game earning a least grade B. (Heavy Mod, No infinite unlockables)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos
